short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab extension for the Spark Teen incubator program

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new tab page for the Spark Teen incubator program.

Features include:
- A countdown to a weekly deadline, helping founders to stay on their feet
- A display of a to-do list linked to maximize productivity
- Announcements from Spark Teen, straight to your new tab
- Customisable shortcuts to frequently used websites
